column3: awesome bbq. My fiancee wasn't really too impressed
column4: though. I had the half brisket sandwich
column6: had the baked beans and the cole slaw. I loved how the slaw wasn't a mayo based but more vinegar. The baked beans were really tasty as well. We also had the mac and cheese which was ok and the corn bread
column7: to which my fiancee stated was the best thing we had
